description: From its sporty silhouette to its terry-knit interior, this soft cashmere sweater draws inspiration from an athletic crewneck.
fitting_details: Reverses from a smooth side to a terry-knit side.
Regular Fit: wider at the chest while still maintaining a modern silhouette.
Size medium has a 27" body length (front and back), a 41.5" chest, and a 33" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes ½" between sizes.
Long raglan sleeves with rib-knit cuffs.
Cashmere. Hand wash or dry clean. Imported.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
